titleStmt.title: Argalus and Parthenia· as it hath been acted at the court before their Maiesties: and at the Private-House in Drury-Lane, by their Maiesties Servants. By Hen. Glapthorne.
titleStmt.author: Glapthorne, Henry.
Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586. Arcadia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Bishop for Daniel Pakeman, at the Raine-bow neere the Inner Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: The plot is based on: Sidney, Sir Philip. Arcadia.
The title page is in two settings: (1) line 10 begins "By" or (2) "The Authour", and line 9 reads "By thier Maiesties Servants.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Raine-bow neere the Inner Temple Gate
